name: How to Nounsify the CryptoPunks Community
description: In partnership with Zora, we are launching a platform to "Nounsify" any existing NFT collection. We are starting with the CryptoPunks community, which will launch on Saturday of ETHChicago.

speakers.name: Chris Robison
speakers.bio: CBob.eth is the founder of meTokens and former Hoard, Golem Foundation, and OMG Network teammate. Chris presented the first ever talk on NFT Utility at ETHBerlin in 2018, and has since spoken at DevCon, NFT.NYC, NIFTY (HGK), the ECFâ€™s Non-Fungible Summit, & more. He acquired punk #4330 in 2018 for 0.15 ETH ($34).

speakers.name: Greg Mathes
speakers.bio: Cofounder Wander Labs. Formerly Risk & Data @ Coinbase, Binance US, Moonpay, & Wyre. Founder of the Cambridge NFT Meetup. Moonbirds Holder. fxhash enthusiast.
